title: India key to shaping future of Artificial Intelligence, says Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei after meeting PM Modi
description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei met PM Modi in New Delhi to talk about the company's expansion in India. Bengaluru will host its first office, enhancing local AI talent and innovation. Modi highlighted the importance of AI in sectors like education and healthcare.
content: US-based AI firm Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei met Prime Minister Narendra Modi in New Delhi on Saturday, days after it was revealed that the company is set to open its first Indian office in Bengaluru as a part of its expansion into the Asia Pacific ma... [2326 chars]

title: Your Money: Cybersecurity and your money in the AI era
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has brought remarkable advances to everyday life, but unfortunately, it has also supercharged the tools available to criminals. For investors and families, this new reality comes with new risks and new responsibilities. According to the FBI’s Internet Crime Complaint Center, reported fraud losses exceeded $16 billion in 2024, a record figure. AI […]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Prime Minister Modi Engages with AI Innovator Dario Amodei
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Apple sued over use of copyrighted books to train Apple Intelligence
description: APPLE was hit with a lawsuit in California federal court by a pair of neuroscientists who say that the tech company misused thousands of copyrighted books to train its Apple Intelligence artificial intelligence (AI) model.
content:

title: Cybersecurity is top business priority
description: CYBER risk is no longer episodic — it is persistent, stealthy, and accelerating. The widespread use of artificial intelligence (AI) by cybercriminals is transforming the threat landscape, while growing IT complexity — from cloud and hybrid infrastructure to identity and IoT — has made detection and response more difficult, especially for stretched security teams. The consequences of a breach now extend far beyond technical disruption, resulting in reputational damage, regulatory penalties, data loss, operational downtime, and significant financial impact.

title: Whose data counts?
description: AS artificial intelligence continues to shape how we interact, transact, and govern, it is observed that the people most affected by digital systems often have the least say in how they are designed. If we are to build smarter governance, stronger institutions, and more ethical technologies, we must center the conversation on one thing: data must work for the people it represents.

title: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei Meets PM Modi to Shape India’s Responsible AI Future
description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei met with Prime Minister Narendra Modi in New Delhi on Friday to discuss the company’s plans for expanding its operations in India and advancing the development of safe and beneficial artificial intelligence (AI) in the country.

title: Anthropic CEO meets PM Modi to discuss India expansion; Bengaluru chosen for first office
description: US-based artificial intelligence company Anthropic is setting up its first office in India, in Bengaluru, as part of its growing presence in the Indo-Pacific region. The announcement came after Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei met Prime Minister Narendra Modi to discuss the company's plans for expansion and India's role in the future of AI.
